subject: Mike Brown, Chicago - Newsletter
body:
SREA Coming Out Of The Shadows!
Score One Inc.
sRe a
cL: $0.11
SREA has been keeping quite for some time. 
Acquiring one company after the other and reorganizing its direction. 

We have heard they are getting ready to make a come back 
and we should expect big things. This one could be huge and it 
is the right p rice. Get ahead of it. 
Get on SR E A Wed!
